hosted.title: Self Hosted
features: All users are Pro by default

SelfHosted.title: A TRADUIRE
SelfHosted.desc: Keep complete control of your data by self-hosting Retrospected. One-time fee, unlimited updates. Get up and running with our amazing documentation in no time.
features: Complete control: your data stays on your premises

Features.heading: Commencez une rétro en quelques secondes
Features.description: Starting or joining a retro is as easy as 1, 2, 3. It's friction-less.
